name: Cultist
description: Cultists are medium humanoids typically wearing tattered robes and armed with crude weapons like daggers, demonstrating a fanatical loyalty to dark deities.
memorable: Their unwavering devotion can lead to dangerous situations, especially when they perform dark rituals or summon creatures.
goals: Carrying out the will of darker powers and performing secretive, malevolent practices.
relations: Often work in groups and can be encountered alongside more powerful dark entities.
environment: Hidden temples, caves, or abandoned ruins.
strengths: Possess advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, reflecting their strong dedication.
weaknesses: Very low hit points make them easy to defeat if targeted effectively.
attacks: Employ a Dagger for melee or ranged attacks, dealing low piercing damage but can capitalize on vulnerable targets.
most_powerful_ability: Dark Devotion grants resistance against being charmed or frightened, providing them with some resilience.
equipment: Wears simple leather armor and uses a dagger as a weapon.
skills: Skilled in Deception and Religion, enabling them to manipulate and deceive others in pursuit of their goals.
additional_information: Cultists can sacrifice themselves to protect allies nearby.
Often appear insane in their beliefs and practices.
Perform dark rituals to summon powers and creatures.
Relatively agile in combat due to decent Dexterity.
Act as expendable servants to greater evils.
test_queries: low hit point followers of evil deities
fragile minions dedicated to dark powers
